full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MDZOD KYI LDE MIG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @046B SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MDZOD KYI LDE MIG CES BYA BA KHA CHE'I MKHAN PO BLA MA DHARMA SHR'IS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,'PHAGS PA BSDUD PA'I GDAMS GDAMS NGAG 'DI, ,BYANG CHUB SA'I SNYING PO DPAL, 'BUM STENGS KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG GSAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DUS SU, SLOB DPON CHEN PO BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DANG GDAN 'DZOM NAS, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA 'DI @047A *, ,BSGYUR CING BKA' STZAL TE, STON SGOM SPAG MA GSUM GYIS ZHU BA PHUL` DGE SLONG DRI MA MED PAS YON BDAG MDZAD NAS MKHAS PA CHEN PO PA REG LO TZ'A BAS SEMS CAN KYI DON DU BSGYUR PA'O`` `` SMRAS PA, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS 'DI LA BRTEN 'BYUNG PHYIR, ,RGYAL BA RANG NYID YANG YANG BSNGAGS PA DANG, ,YANG YANG YANGS SU @047B GTANG DANG GLED GZHI SOGS, ,RNAM GRANGS DU MAS GZHAN LAS KHYAD 'PHAGS GSUNGS, ,SHIN TU 'PHRAD DKA' GONG NA MED PA 'DI, ,YAL PAR 'DOR BA DPYOD LDAN SU ZHIG YOD, ,LAN GCIG THOS PA'I RTEN BZANG THOB DUS 'DIR, ,THAR BA'I SA BON CI THUB BZHAG DGOS LAGS ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BA'I RTZA BA CI MCHIS PA, ,'GRO KUN SPYI DANG @048A *, ,KHYAD PAR PAR 'DI YI, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR BA 'BREL THOG DE DAG KUN, ,SKU GSUM MYUR DU THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DANG GUS LDAN PA'I BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS, ,DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'DRIN GZO BA DANG, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHEN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,PAR 'DI HU RE CHEN MOR LEGS PAR BSGRUBS,, ,,'DI NI NYI ZLA LTAR SA STENG DU KHYAB 'GYUR CIG ,
